description: Athena Saori watches over peace on Earth from Sanctuary and over young Kouga, until an invader causes commotion when he tries to kidnap Athena and the baby. Kouga is saved from certain death by the timely arrival of Gold Saint Seiya, who engages the mysterious invader, who reveals his identity as Mars. A new conflict begins as Seiya and Mars battle for the fate of Kouga, who years later, determined to live his life as he sees fit, challenges Athena.

titles.title: Sauvé par Seiya. La légende des Chevaliers renaît !
Seiya ga Sukutta Inochi! Yomigaere Saint Densetsu!
The Life that Seiya Saved! The Saint Legend, Revive!
星矢が救った命! 甦れ聖闘士[セイント]伝説!
